member.name: M:IFilterShellView.GlobalKeyboardHook.AddHotkeys(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Windows.Input.Key},System.Action)
member.param: The short keys. minimum is two keys
The action to run when the key ocmbination has pressed
An action to run when unsubscribing from keyboard hook. can be null
member.returns: Event id to use when unregister

members.member:
Working conditions
- I am inside an explorer shell window. I press CTRL+F hotkey and a popup window shows up. - I insert text in the popup and folders/files in explorer start to be selected
Popup closing events - I click outside the popup and it dissapears
Expected behaviour - When I press CTRL+F while in the same folder I want the filtering to continue from where I left.
